episodeTitle: A Paradise in Hell! Impel Down - Level 5.5!
description: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei frees Luffy from Level 5 and searches for Emporio Ivankov, who may be able to cure Luffy's poisoning. After being attacked by Army Wolves, which Luffy defeats using his Haki, they are rescued by Inazuma and awakened in Level 5.5, a hidden paradise within Impel Down where they meet the legendary Emporio Ivankov.

events.title: Mr. 2 Arrives at Level 5
events.description: Bentham (Mr. 2), disguised as Hannyabal, arrives at Level 5 with the unconscious and severely poisoned Luffy. He searches for a way to cure Luffy's deadly poisoning from Magellan.
events.significance: Sets up the search for Emporio Ivankov, establishing the episode's main quest to save Luffy's life.

events.title: Buggy and Galdino Encounter Army Wolves
events.description: Buggy and Galdino (Mr. 3) attempt to escape through Level 5's frozen wasteland but are continually hunted by the Army Wolves. They try to defend themselves using Galdino's wax abilities to create a bunker, but the wolves prove too cunning.
events.significance: Provides comic relief while demonstrating the dangers of Level 5's Army Wolves and the harsh environment prisoners face.

events.title: Mr. 2 Breaks Luffy Out of His Cell
events.description: Bentham finds Luffy imprisoned in a cell on Level 5 and decides to break him free despite the risks. He carries the unconscious Luffy across the frozen wasteland in search of Emporio Ivankov.
events.significance: Demonstrates Mr. 2's unwavering loyalty and friendship to Luffy, willing to risk everything to save his friend's life.

events.title: Army Wolves Attack Luffy and Mr. 2
events.description: While crossing Level 5's frozen terrain, Luffy and Bentham are attacked by a pack of Army Wolves. Bentham tries to fight them off but is quickly overwhelmed by the vicious predators.
events.significance: Creates the desperate situation that triggers Luffy's unconscious use of Haki and leads to their rescue by Inazuma.

events.title: Luffy's Unconscious Haki Display
events.description: Despite being severely poisoned and barely conscious, Luffy unleashes an angry outburst of Conqueror's Haki that knocks out all the attacking Army Wolves. This happens instinctively as he tries to protect Bentham.
events.significance: Marks an important early display of Luffy's latent Conqueror's Haki (Haoshoku Haki) ability, foreshadowing his future mastery of this rare power. This is one of the first clear demonstrations of this ability since Amazon Lily.

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy's angry shout as he unleashes his Haki against the wolves

events.title: Inazuma's Debut
events.description: A mysterious figure dressed in orange and white with a distinctive lightning bolt scar over their right eye appears before the unconscious Luffy and Bentham. This person, holding a glass of wine, is Inazuma, a Revolutionary Army officer.
events.significance: Introduces Inazuma, who will play a crucial role in the Impel Down breakout and later proves to be an important member of the Revolutionary Army under Dragon.

events.title: Arrival at Level 5.5 - New Kama Land
events.description: Luffy and Bentham awaken in an unexpected location - a hidden paradise between Level 5 and Level 6 called Level 5.5 or New Kama Land. This secret sanctuary is filled with okama (cross-dressers), music, food, and celebration, completely unknown to Impel Down's guards.
events.significance: Reveals the existence of a secret level in Impel Down that has existed for over 100 years, created by prisoners to escape the prison's horrors. This becomes a crucial base for the eventual prison break.

events.title: Emporio Ivankov's Grand Entrance
events.description: Bentham awakens at a lively party in New Kama Land. A large man with a massive purple afro, wearing theatrical feminine clothing and a queen's crown atop a king's crown, appears on stage. This is Emporio Ivankov, the legendary 'Miracle Person' and Queen of the Kamabakka Kingdom, whom Bentham has been desperately seeking.
events.significance: Introduces one of the most important characters in the Summit War Saga. Ivankov's hormone powers can potentially save Luffy, and as a Revolutionary Army commander, his involvement sets up major future storylines including connections to Dragon and the Revolutionary Army.

quotes.text: Welcome to the paradise of Level 5.5, The New Kama Land!
quotes.speaker: Emporio Ivankov
quotes.context: Ivankov's first words as he welcomes Bentham to the hidden sanctuary

events.title: Revelation of New Kama Land's History
events.description: Ivankov explains that Level 5.5 was created long ago by a prisoner with digging abilities (later revealed to be created by someone with the Push-Push Fruit over 100 years ago). The hidden level has secret passageways to every level above it, allowing them to rescue prisoners that Impel Down believes were 'demoned away'.
events.significance: Expands One Piece world-building by revealing that Impel Down, supposedly the world's most secure prison, has a massive blind spot that has existed for over a century. Also establishes a safe haven for marginalized individuals.

events.title: Introduction of New Kama Land Residents
events.description: Various residents of New Kama Land are shown celebrating, including Francois, Tsunokkov, and Usakkov. These characters are members of the Newkama community living in the hidden paradise.
events.significance: Establishes the community of New Kama Land and the diverse group of individuals who have found refuge there.

events.title: Bentham Recognizes Ivankov
events.description: Bentham realizes that the flamboyant figure before him is Emporio Ivankov, the former Queen of the Kamabakka Kingdom and the legendary 'Okama King' he has been searching for to save Luffy's life.
events.significance: Establishes the connection between Bentham and Ivankov's shared okama culture, and confirms that the person who might save Luffy has been found.

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy's unconscious Haki burst against the Army Wolves

quotes.text: Welcome to the paradise of Level 5.5, The New Kama Land!
quotes.speaker: Emporio Ivankov

themes.description: Mr. 2's unwavering dedication to saving Luffy's life demonstrates the deep bond of friendship that transcends their original roles as enemies. He risks everything to find a cure for his poisoned friend.
themes.symbolism: Bentham carrying Luffy through the frozen wasteland symbolizes the burden friends willingly bear for each other.

themes.description: Level 5.5 represents a safe haven for marginalized individuals, particularly the okama community. It's a paradise hidden within hell where those rejected by society can find acceptance and community.
themes.symbolism: The secret level between floors symbolizes the spaces that marginalized communities create for themselves when excluded from mainstream society.
culturalReferences: Japanese LGBTQ+ culture and the okama/newkama communities

themes.description: Luffy's unconscious use of Conqueror's Haki, even while severely poisoned, hints at his special nature and destined role in the world.
themes.symbolism: The manifestation of Haki in moments of desperation represents the inner strength that emerges when protecting those we care about.

characterSpotlights.development: Bentham's character deepens as he demonstrates complete selflessness, risking his own safety to find help for the poisoned Luffy. His friendship with Luffy has transformed him from antagonist to one of Luffy's most loyal allies.
keyActions: Breaks Luffy out of his Level 5 cell
Carries Luffy across the frozen wasteland
Fights off Army Wolves to protect Luffy

characterSpotlights.development: Despite being unconscious and poisoned, Luffy demonstrates his latent Conqueror's Haki, showing that even in his weakest state, his willpower is extraordinary.
keyActions: Unconsciously unleashes Conqueror's Haki against the Army Wolves
Arrives at New Kama Land where he will receive treatment

characterSpotlights.development: Introduced as a legendary figure - the Okama King and ruler of New Kama Land. His flamboyant personality and powerful presence immediately establish him as a major player in the upcoming events.
keyActions: Welcomes Bentham to New Kama Land
Establishes himself as the ruler of the hidden paradise
quotes: Welcome to the paradise of Level 5.5, The New Kama Land!

characterSpotlights.development: Introduced mysteriously as a wine-drinking figure who rescues Luffy and Bentham. Their calm demeanor and distinctive appearance make them memorable despite limited dialogue.
keyActions: Rescues Luffy and Bentham from the wolves
Brings them to New Kama Land

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extended some scenes of Buggy and Galdino being chased by the Army Wolves for pacing purposes, adding more comedy to their predicament.
Additional atmospheric shots of Level 5's frozen landscape were added to emphasize the harsh environment and the difficulty of Bentham's journey.

trivia.fact: Episode 438 aired with a TV rating of 11.6%, ranking #5 in its time slot, showing strong viewer interest in Ivankov's introduction.

Emporio Ivankov was originally voiced by Norio Imamura in Japanese. However, Imamura was forced to step down from the role following an arrest in July 2010, and the role was taken over by Mitsuo Iwata.

The Army Wolves were originally stationed on Level 2 with other beasts but were moved to Level 5 because they were too vicious - they hunted and ate the other guardian beasts including the Basilisk and Sphinx.
Level 5.5 (New Kama Land) was created over 100 years before the current timeline by a prisoner with the Push-Push Fruit, making it one of the oldest hidden locations in the One Piece world.
This episode adapts parts of Chapters 536 and 537 from the manga, specifically pages 12-19 of Chapter 536 and pages 3-9 of Chapter 537.
The opening theme 'Kaze wo Sagashite' was initially aired without crediting the singer Mari Yaguchi for episodes 426-429, but this was corrected in the DVD release.

sources.title: Kaze wo Sagashite - One Piece Wiki
